mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('agente de inovacao envolvido em decisao') description, ag.name agent_name, sp.name speciality_name, kia.al_id id from alternative_has_speciality alsp inner join alternative al on al.id = alsp.alternative_id inner join speciality sp on sp.id = alsp.speciality_id inner join inovationagent ia on ia.id = sp.inovationagent_id inner join agent ag on ag.id = ia.id inner join ( select kia.agent_id ag, al.id al_id from knowledgeintensiveactivity kia inner join decision dc on dc.kia_activity_id = kia.activity_id inner join alternative al on al.id = dc.id where kia.activity_id = #{id} ) kia on kia.al_id = al.id;

select concat('socializacao', case when syncrounous = 1 then ' sincrona' when syncrounous = 0 then ' assincrona' else '' end) description, (case when syncrounous = 1 then true when syncrounous = 0 then false else null end ) syncrounous, ag.name agent_name, sc.collaborativesession_id id from socialization sc inner join activity ac on ac.id = sc.comunicativeinteraction_id inner join agent ag on ag.id = agentid where sc.collaborativesession_id = #{id};

select concat('agentes envolvidos em comunicacao') description, a.name agent_name, c.comunicativeinteraction_id id from comunicativeinteraction ci inner join comunication c on ci.complexaction_id = c.comunicativeinteraction_id inner join agent a on a.id = sender_agent_id where c.comunicativeinteraction_id = #{id};

select concat('participacao de recursos') description, p.description participation_desc, r.resourcetype resource_type, ac.id from activity ac inner join knowledgeintensiveactivity kia on ac.id = kia.activity_id inner join complexaction ca on ca.id = ac.id inner join participation p on p.complexaction_id = ca.id inner join resourceparticipation rs on p.id = rs.participation_id inner join resource r on r.id = rs.resource_id where ac.id in( select complexaction_id from participation ) and ac.id = #{id};

select concat('sessao colaborativa') description, ac.id id from collaborativesession cs inner join COLLABORATIVESESSION_HAS_PROTOCOL cHP on cs.id = chp.collaborativesession_id inner join protocol p on p.id = chp.protocol_id inner join ACTIONCONTRIBUTION_HAS_PROTOCOL AHP on ahp.protocol_id = p.id inner join ACTIONCONTRIBUTION AC on ac.id = ahp.actioncontribution_id where ac.id = #{id};

select ci.complexaction_id comunicativeinteraction_id, ac.name comunicativeinteraction_name, kia.agent_id kia_agent, ag.id agent_comunication_id, ag.name agent_comunication_name, il.languagetype language_type, case when (sa.agent_id is not null) then 'Muitos' else 'Um' end cadinality from comunicativeinteraction ci inner join activity ac on ac.id = ci.complexaction_id left outer join knowledgeintensiveactivity kia on kia.activity_id = ac.id inner join comunication cm on ci.complexaction_id = cm.comunicativeinteraction_id inner join message m on m.id = cm.message_id left outer join idiomaticlanguage il on il.id = m.idiomaticlanguage_id inner join agent ag on ag.id = cm.sender_agent_id left outer join socialagent sa on ag.id = sa.agent_id where ci.complexaction_id = #{id};
